main_page_text.title: Iced Drinks
main_page_text.description: Costa's Iced Drinks are the perfect beverages during a hot summer day. All of our iced drinks are made right in-front of you. Would you like to use oat milk? No Problem! More Ice? Pronto! Our flavours range from Iced Lattes to Cold Brews and finally to Iced Chai Tea Latte.

main_page_text.title: Hot Drinks
main_page_text.description: Our hot drinks are best served on a cool day of Winter. They will warm you up either on a cool morning, or as a refresher in the evening. Our drinks are all made in house, right in-front of you, allowing you to see the love put into the product. From our large array of drinks, our Lattes, Hot Chcolates and Mochas represent our most loved drinks from our selection, learn more about them!

main_page_text.title: Canned Drinks
main_page_text.description: Costa Canned drinks are ready-to-drink beverages available in a range of flavors such as Classic Latte, Caramel Latte, and Americano. These convenient and portable drinks are perfect for on-the-go and can be enjoyed chilled or at room temperature.

footer.title: Dietary Information
items: Food Ready to drink dietary information

drinks.title: Iced Latte Every Day
drinks.slogan: Chill a hot day with our signature drink!
drinks.name: Iced Latte
drinks.description: A Costa iced latte is a refreshing cold drink made with shots of espresso, fresh milk, and a touch of sweetness. Perfect for hot summer days or as a mid-day pick-me-up.

drinks.title: Cold Brew, Low Calories, High Energy
drinks.slogan: Low calories, High energy. Dark and cold, as it should be
drinks.name: Cold Brew
drinks.description: Cold brew is a delicious and refreshing coffee beverage that is made by steeping coffee grounds in cold water for an extended period of time. The result is a smooth and less acidic coffee that is perfect for hot summer days or anytime you want a refreshing iced coffee drink.

drinks.title: Iced Chai Tea Latte, Spice up your day!
drinks.slogan: Not a fan of coffee? Our Chai tea latte is the perfect substitute
drinks.name: Iced Chai Tea Latte
drinks.description: Iced Chai Tea Iced Latte is a delicious and refreshing beverage made with spiced tea and milk, served over ice. Its a perfect combination of sweet and spicy flavors that is perfect for hot summer days or anytime you want a unique and flavorful iced drink.

drinks.title: Latte Every Day
drinks.name: Latte
drinks.description: What is the best way to start the day? With a nice and warm Latte, prepared by our finest baristas!

drinks.title: Creamy, Homemade, Hot Chocolate
drinks.slogan: Perfect Sweetness Punch to start off the day
drinks.name: Hot Chocolate
drinks.description: Are you not a fan of coffee? Don't worry, we are experts in the making of Hot Chocolate. Sugar or no sugar, no problem, AND we will include some whipped cream if you wish!

drinks.title: Coffee + Chocolate = Mocha
drinks.slogan: Spice up your day with the Choco Coffee Combo!
drinks.name: Mocha
drinks.description: Are you a fan of Coffee AND Hot Chocolate? Then, the mocha mixes the strenght of both drinks into one. The sweetness of the hot choclate with the energy punch given by coffee, all in one simple package.

drinks.title: Perfectly Portable Latte
drinks.slogan: Indulge in your favorite, anytime, anywhere
drinks.name: Latte
drinks.description: A Costa iced latte is a refreshing cold drink made with shots of espresso, fresh milk, and a touch of sweetness. Perfect for hot summer days or as a mid-day pick-me-up.

drinks.title: Caramel Latte, to boost your sweetness
drinks.slogan: Indulge in your favorite, now caramelized!
drinks.name: Caramel Latte
drinks.description: A Costa iced latte is a refreshing cold drink made with shots of espresso, fresh milk, and a touch of sweetness. Perfect for hot summer days or as a mid-day pick-me-up.

drinks.title: Americano, simple coffee, anywhere
drinks.slogan: Boost of energy, the American Way
drinks.name: Americano
drinks.description: A Costa iced latte is a refreshing cold drink made with shots of espresso, fresh milk, and a touch of sweetness. Perfect for hot summer days or as a mid-day pick-me-up.

modal.title: About Costa
modal.description: We have 50 years experience of crafting the finest quality coffee. From revolutionary methods and commitment to quality to unforgettable successes that have made Costa Coffee the Nation’s Favourite* coffee shop, our story is as unique as our coffee.

carousel.title: Iced Latte
carousel.description: Have a nice Costa latte, submerged by iced cubes. The perfect drink for a hot day of summer.

carousel.title: Cold Brew
carousel.description: Not a fan of calories, don't worry, our cold brew will energize you with no extra sugar!

carousel.title: Iced Chai Tea Latte
carousel.description: Not a fan of coffee? No worries, the Iced Chai Tea Latte is a perfect summer beverage!

carousel.title: Latte
carousel.description: What's better than a day out in the snow? A day out in the snow with a hot latte!

carousel.title: Hot Chococlate
carousel.description: Warm up your night out with a hot chocolate!

carousel.title: Mocha
carousel.description: Have a fancy Mocha anywhere, even at your construction place!

carousel.title: Canned Latte
carousel.description: Get your Latte in a can, to drink anywhere you want!

carousel.title: Canned Caramel Latte
carousel.description: A latte is not enough for you? Don't worry, get the caramel variant for an extra punch of sweetness!

carousel.title: Canned Americano
carousel.description: Do you prefer a simpler, stronger, traditional Americano? We have it canned and ready to be drinked!

accordion.title: 1) I'm experiencing issues with the App
accordion.explanation: If the scan on your device fails whilst using the app at a till, check with the barista and try again. Baristas can also add your Beans retrospectively if the issue continues. If you’re using the app at an Express machine and the scan on your device fails, please try again and double check that you are connected to Wi-fi. For help with any other app related issue, see here.

accordion.title: 2) How can I register to Costa Club?
accordion.explanation: It's simple! Download our Costa Club app to register and start collecting beans today. If you have a plastic card, you can register it here.

accordion.title: 3) How can I replace my lost card?
accordion.explanation: Log in to your Costa Club account here and select the ‘Card’ tab. Here, you’ll find instructions on how to replace your card. You can also download our app and login to start collecting beans. Don’t worry! You won’t lose the beans you’ve collected on your lost card, as all your beans will show in your account.

offcanvas.title: Iced Drinks
offcanvas.explanation: There is nothing better than drinking a nice chilled drink during a warm day. Our Iced Latte is the perfect way to get an energy boost while cooling down. Not a fan of calories? Our Cold Brew is low in calories while keeping the referesing and energizing boost of an iced latte. Our Chai Tea Latte is for anyone who wants a special, sweet drink without the energy of coffee.

offcanvas.title: Hot Drinks
offcanvas.explanation: Our hot drinks are the perfect way to keep warm during a busy day. Our Latte, arguably our most popular drink, will give you a boost in energy and make your warm at the same time. Our Hot Chocolate is for anyone who wants to sip on something sweet and warm. Our Mocha is for the fan of both coffee and hot chocolate.

offcanvas.title: Canned Drinks
offcanvas.explanation: We understand how busy a day can get, this is why we created canned versions of our most favourite drinks. We have our original Latte flavour, perfect for a simple boost of energy. Our Caramel Latte variant, which adds that tingines of sweetness and saltiness. Lastly our Americano, a simple, dark coffee ready whenever you need.
